website_summaries.verdict: Perfect option for  those who need to carry heavy loads regularly.
pros: Will fit almost any bike on the market up to 29 inches
Can handle up to 310 pounds of load, thanks to high-grade support bar and sturdy aluminum alloy material
Offers adjustable height in both the front and back
cons: Weighs more when empty than the majority of other cargo racks

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable bicycle shelf
customer_reviews.text: This bike shelf quality is very good, very solid I 150LB sit above not askew, screw tool is very complete, also very easy to assemble, the only bad is the assembly tool after the use of hexagonal tools are worn out quickly round it! Overall it's still a good shelf, so I'll give it 5 stars and hope to improve the assembly tool. If someone buys or does not have the improvement tool, I will change the comment to one star thanks!
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.title: happy with it
customer_reviews.text: got it on friday and installed it on wife's bike on sunday. took me around 45 mins with my own tool. it would of take longer time if you gonna use the tools that come with, because they suck. very good product, happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: MING H LIN

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price. Disappointing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great rack. It’s really sturdy and it’s safe to use as base for a child carrier ( if you have one that fits its shape, like mine). I don’t rate 5 stars because couple washers and a nut were missing in the package and when I contacted Westgirl they never answer back. It feels if you have any issue with your product they are not going to help you.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE ANGEL ESPINO

customer_reviews.title: Loads
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, i think it can handle an 200lb adult. Took it a little over a week to shipped from china to ny.
customer_reviews.author: ShengJ

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and light. At the place I work I have a friend the parks really far away so I bake him to his car everyday lol it holds him and it hold me. I’m about 200 lbs and he’s about the same it holds me when I sit on it and it’s not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This rack is beefy and well constructed. Installed in minutes with some simple tools. Will buy again for my other bike.
customer_reviews.author: bkmstng

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier... I added metal saddle bags on each side and it has been holding up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This bag sucks because it will not stand the test of durability
customer_reviews.text: I had a small impact on my bike. The bag was very lightly loaded but the snaps broke. This happened within the first 24 hours of me owning the bags. The bags look nice but they have zero durability
customer_reviews.author: jose luis soto

customer_reviews.title: five stars
customer_reviews.text: This bicycle rack is very good, the installation is simple, I installed the basket on it, I can put a lot of things, I go to buy the food in the basket on the shelf, easy to ride back home, I recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Chen

customer_reviews.title: Strong!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it not only looks good but it is well built and solid it will carry anything I wish to carry on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: gunleather

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Package shipped quickly. Tracking was accurate, no second delivery needed. Everything was there, nothing missing.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Y.

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So the installation video wasn't helpful at all. Didn't say what side Bolt where supposed to God but other than that it's very sturdy. And held a 50lb of dog food very well. It didn't shift
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The package has arrived Whit all things (nuts, screws), The product quality is good and does not fit easily on the road bike 29. the bags where the tools came from was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Take it from a bike savvy individual......this is a complete piece of garbage, not sturdy, instructions suck overall piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Millard Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I am installing this support.i think it is look very firm and beautiful and easy to do it myself
customer_reviews.author: enmin gou

customer_reviews.title: Received it with open-box.  WOWWWWWWWW
customer_reviews.text: I got open-box n has not manual instruction inside. Plus, the assemble tool suck!
customer_reviews.author: gg

product_meta.title: WESTGIRL Bike Rack - Bicycle Cargo Rack with Fender Board, 310LB Capacity Solid Loads Touring Carrier, Height Adjustable Quick Release Seatpost Mount, Cycling Equipment
